name: create-modern-app
description: Quickly create modern webapps and websites from the terminal
author: Jeremy Tenjo

scripts.test:create-webapp-prod: npm i -g && npx --yes create-modern-app --name testResult/app --type webapp --force
scripts.test:create-website-prod: npm i -g && npx --yes create-modern-app --name testResult/app --type website --force
scripts.test:create-demo-prod: npm i -g && npx --yes create-modern-app --name testResult/app --type demo --force
scripts.deploy: npm run test && npm run build && npm publish --access public && auto-changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.deploy:without-testing: npm run build && npm publish --access public && auto-changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md
